Once upon a time, many years ago, there lived six young men.
They were very keen to learn and never stopped searching for knowledge.

One day they were walking through the dark Indian forest, when they heard a sound.
They all stopped and listened carefully.
one of them asked.

So very slowly and carefully they approached the sound.
Suddenly a voice called out.
Good morning, gentlemen.
Where are you going?
Oh, nowhere; we're just looking for something,' replied the six blind men nervously.'
'Who are you?
Im a teacher, replied the voice.
Can I help you?
Perhaps you could teach us something new and interesting?
they all suggested eagerly.

Stop and listen to me!

We're sorry, they said.
